document.full_text: a profile in the new yorker shows that fred wilpon still follows the mets with the critical eye of george steinbrenner in his prime.
document.title: on baseball: mets' fred wilpon puts his fan's cap on and speaks his mind
lines_and_colors: a profile in the new yorker shows that fred wilpon still follows the mets with the critical eye of george steinbrenner in his prime.
